    Parallelisation Connection to EDP hosts Vaults, Files, Datasets and Objects

    Parallelisation

    Parallelisation.Rmd

    Implementation

    • Implemented using R future package package.

    First read part of data 

    library(quartzbio.edp)
Sys.setenv(EDP_PROFILE = "vsim-dev_rw")


# contains > 3 millions of rows
ds <- Dataset(full_path = "quartzbio:Public:/TCGA/2.0.0-2018-mc3-v0.2.8/SomaticMutations-GRCh37")
#> Loading required package: RcppSimdJson
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v1/user...
#> Connected to https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio with user "Marc Lamarine" using an API Token
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
ds$documents_count
#> [1] 3603497
# 3 603 497
COLS <- c("ensp", "variant_class")
df0 <- Dataset_query(ds, limit = 10000, meta = FALSE)
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/datasets/1959547506112563037/data...




# fetch first 10000 rows
FILTER <- filters('variant_classification = "Silent"')
system.time(df1 <- Dataset_query(ds, fields = COLS, filters = FILTER, 
limit = 10000, meta = FALSE))
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/datasets/1959547506112563037/data...
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   0.015   0.000   0.164

    Read all data 

    library(progressr)
library(future.apply)
#> Loading required package: future

# uncomment to see progress bars
#
#handlers(global = FALSE)
#handlers("txtprogressbar")

# sequential - no parallelisation
plan(sequential)
system.time(df <- Dataset_query(ds, fields = COLS, 
filters = FILTER, limit = 10000, meta = FALSE, all = TRUE, verbose = FALSE))
#> got all results.
#> took 0.390000000000001 to bind the data frames
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   2.691   0.092  15.718

plan(multicore, workers = 4)
system.time(df.4 <- Dataset_query(ds, fields = COLS, filters = FILTER, limit = 10000, 
  meta = FALSE, all = TRUE, verbose = FALSE))
#> got all results.
#> took 0.0640000000000001 to bind the data frames
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   3.015   0.490   5.512
